item.title: Hello World
item.description: Rationale Hello? Is this thing on? Good. Welcome, humble reader, to my tech blog. Here you will find all sorts of stuff that I’ve found interesting while working as a consultant and developer for cloud infrastructure and automation, with an eye for security & compliance concerns at scale. Disclaimer: All content here are my opinions, and do not formally represent those of my employers, past, present or future. Whoami? https://www.
